item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Right.
There had to be a witness there, and the official witness apparantly said “Hey, shut the fuck up or I’ll leave.” But he didn’t leave, and there is an audible heckling going on in the tape, calling out the name of radical Shithead cleric " Muqtada al Sadr, as Saddam is hanged.

Read full topic

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Apparently there were only two people in the whole room allowed to have cell phones while the execution was happening (both high ranking officials with the government).

Man, that would make a great cellphone commercial.

[i]
“When Al-Aqbar Al Tikrit filmed the brutal murder of one of the worlds best known dictators, he trusted Verizon Wireless to send the video to all his friends!”

Cut to man riding on camel

“No roaming charges, Allah be praised!”[/i]

hahahahahahahahahaha oh god that was funny

[/quote]
haha you stupid little kid.It wasn’t FUNNY you stupid sickminded cocksucker. It was inhuman. I admit Saddam got what he deserved, but the last thing that video is is “funny”. Lets get a video of you rotting with a noose tied around your neck you stupid bitch. That would make me laugh.[/quote]

dude get over yourself if your getting this angry over a post i can’t Imagen then anger management treatment you need i liked that movie i think at the end the Iraqi’s should of kicked the poop out of him though then it would of been a happy ending

well, believe it or not but some people cant.
here’s a true happened story , so get some popcorn and read:

once upon a time there was a guy that played hockey.
he fell and someone fell on him and the guy cut his throat so there was allot of blood on the ground.
2 people of all the viewers had a heartattack.

The End

so if people already have a heartattack of seeing allot of blood imagine how much people would have a heartattack of watching someone get hanged

(i really did like my story…maybe i should go write some books)

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:21, topic:42624”][quote author=curse63 link=topic=59504.msg727677#msg727677 date=1167811211]
Meh,Good thing he’s dead.He’s already hurt too many people.To be honest,I personally think he deserved it.
[/quote]He deserved much more than that for all the deaths he caused.[/quote]

Ok,how about all his layers of skin riped out until you say the muslce,then,arm length,he got his arm slit open all the way arm length with a knife on each and leg.then,put marjuwana and posion and boilign water into those slits,then,run over by a bull,then,after living through all that,rinsed in vinegar and hung? is that good enough?.

I know,Im sick with killing ideas

item.source: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

PaulT:

[quote=Rictoo]= revenge.

The Christian God is one of the most vengeful fictional characters ever created. Ever read the Old Testament? God zaps motherfuckers left and right. Once some Seraphim) (angels) are carrying some holy relic, and one of them slips and lets a corner of it touch the ground. God zaps his ass. Dead, and it’s clearly an accident. Way to go god, I didn’t even know angels could die, but just because the order was disobeyed by accident doesn’t mean somebody shouldn’t die at the end. All the good bible stories end up with somebody being eaten by lions, or some baby getting cut in half, or alot of Jews getting killed, why end the pattern?

Isn’t the whole message of the bible “Don’t kill somebody unless you know they aren’t connected.”?

Mark Twain:

. I knew that in Biblical times if a man committed a sin the extermination of the whole surrounding nation–cattle and all–was likely to happen. I knew that Providence was not particular about the rest, so that He got somebody connected with the one He was after.[/quote]

Could have sworn I posted this last night and now it’s gone, but

Damn I should go read the bible, sounds exciting.

Read full topic

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

PaulT, you’re talking about the Old Testament. Many things in the Old Testament do not agree with the New Testament (e.g., "Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth). When Christ came, he gave a new revelation.

Don’t be a Jew (literally), and read the New Testament

Read full topic

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

= revenge.

The Christian God is one of the most vengeful fictional characters ever created. Ever read the Old Testament? God zaps motherfuckers left and right. Once some Seraphim) (angels) are carrying some holy relic, and one of them slips and lets a corner of it touch the ground. God zaps his ass. Dead, and it’s clearly an accident. Way to go god, I didn’t even know angels could die, but just because the order was disobeyed by accident doesn’t mean somebody shouldn’t die at the end. All the good bible stories end up with somebody being eaten by lions, or some baby getting cut in half, or alot of Jews getting killed, why end the pattern?

Isn’t the whole message of the bible “Don’t kill somebody unless you know they aren’t connected.”?

. I knew that in Biblical times if a man committed a sin the extermination of the whole surrounding nation--cattle and all--was likely to happen. I knew that Providence was not particular about the rest, so that He got somebody connected with the one He was after.

= revenge.

item.title: Saddams hanging on tape, Found the video
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

moparisthebest:

Great video, too bad it wasn’t of better quality so you could see the tears streaming from the sorry excuse for a human’s eyes, but it was ok for what it was.

He didn’t cry.
And what is up with you guys and your love of capital punishment? All capital punishment is is a sick way of revenge. Mopar, I can’t see how you can be a good Roman Catholic while promoting revenge?

(I would write more, but my keyboard is currently in pieces waiting to be painted, so I am using an onscreen one :p)

Read full topic
